"Defender of the Cake":
"This may seem out of the blue, but have you ever heard
of Naura's Confectionary? It pops up here and there on
different planets. I ordered the party's showcase cake
from them, but I haven't been able to get a hold of them
lately. I'm really worried they've been overrun by
hostiles or something! If you come across them, would you please
give them a hand? For me?"

"突然だけど、あなたナウラのケーキ屋って
知ってるかなっ？　いろんな惑星に
神出鬼没のケーキ屋さん！
そこに、今回のパーティの目玉である
ケーキを頼んでいたんだけど、この前から
連絡とれなくて……もしかしたら
エネミーとかに襲われてて大変なのかも！
だから、もし見かけたら助けてあげてねっ！"
